item.title: Traefik Proxy Integration
item.description: Traefik Proxy is a modern HTTP proxy and load balancer for microservices, heimdall can be integrated with via the ForwardAuth Middleware by making use of the [Decision API](/docs/introduction/architecture/#decision-api). In such setup, traefik delegates authentication and authorization to heimdall. If heimdall answers with a 2XX code, traefik grants access and forwards the original request to the upstream service. item.title: Install from Source
item.description: This document covers how to build heimdall from its source code as well as how to run heimdall using a minimum configuration. item.title: Install
